Nemesis Enforcer:



::Nemesis Enforcer gets up swiftly at the end of Wolfgang's speach (not 
listening to a word of it)::
::Nemesis began to walk off, spinng quickly on his right heel, a plasma 
launcher pointed at Wolfgang, the Predacon working for the Alliance pulling 
the trigger, a powerful dark pink blast of deadly energy striking out at the 
'co-leader' of the Alliance::
::Pulling the trigger a second time, just a few seconds out of the dangerous 
time (pulling the trigger multiple times in a specific time will heat up the 
weapon to a dangerous level), another blast striking out at Wolfgang::

::Nemesis quickly transformed into his beast mode, closing his wings (in bat 
mode) around his entire 15 ft tall form::
